sarah.name: Sarah Johnson
sarah.content: The AI recommendations were spot-on! I was amazed at how well the system understood my needs and found plans that perfectly matched my requirements.

michael.content: As someone who appreciates technology, I loved how the AI analyzed different plans and provided data-driven recommendations. The process was efficient and the results were excellent.

emily.name: Emily Rodriguez
emily.content: Finding the right insurance used to be overwhelming, but this AI-powered platform made it simple and straightforward. I'm very satisfied with my coverage.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Find answers to common questions about our AI-powered insurance recommendations

howWorks.question: How does the AI recommendation system work?
howWorks.answer: Our AI analyzes your profile, preferences, and requirements to match you with insurance plans from our extensive database. It considers factors like coverage needs, budget, and risk factors to provide personalized recommendations.

accuracy.question: How accurate are the AI recommendations?
accuracy.answer: Our AI system has been trained on thousands of insurance cases and is continuously updated. It provides highly accurate matches based on your specific needs, with a satisfaction rate of over 95% among our users.

cost.question: Is there a cost for using the AI recommendation service?
cost.answer: No, our AI recommendation service is completely free to use. You only pay for the insurance plan you choose to purchase.

support.question: Can I speak with a human advisor?
support.answer: Yes! While our AI provides initial recommendations, you can always schedule a call with our licensed insurance advisors to discuss your options in detail.
